text: Hum ney issi tarah tumhen aadil ummat banaya hai takay tum logon per gawah hojao aur rasool (PBUH) tum per gawah hojayen jiss qiblay per tum pehlay say thay ussay hum ney iss liye muqarrar kiya tha kay hum jaan len kay rasool ka sacha tabey daar kaun hai aur kaun hai jo apni aeyrhiyon kay ball palat jata hai go yeh kaam mushkil hai magar jinhen Allah ney hidayat di hai (unn per koi mushkil nahi) Allah Taalaa tumharay aemaal zaya na keray ga Allah Taalaa logon kay sath shafqat aur meharbani kerney wala hai
